Title: Relates to real property subject to an authorization for a real property tax exemption
Summary: Relates to real property subject to an authorization for a real property tax exemption in the town of Smithtown, county of Suffolk, with respect to the 2019 and 2020 assessment rolls.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 250 of the laws of 2022 relating to authorizing the assessor of the town of Smithtown, county of Suffolk, to accept from the New Horizons Counseling Center, Inc., an application for exemption from real property taxes, in relation to making a technical correction thereto regarding the property subject to such real property tax exemption
